definition: to write as substitute for sb/a ghost writer/plagiarism
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Objective: To explore the advantages of septoplasty by nasal endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 探讨鼻代写职称论文内镜下鼻中隔成形术的治疗效果。

sentences.english: More medical paper how to write for the price?
sentences.chinese: 更多代写医学论文价格如何？

sentences.english: The Wuchang let the fortune teller to write with notices.
sentences.chinese: 那五常让算命先生代写应战告示。
她的回忆录是由别人代写的。

sentences.english: I ghosted his weekly rugby column for the Telegraph.
sentences.chinese: 我为他代写《电讯报》每周的橄榄球专栏。

sentences.english: The pressure to publish has created a ghostwriting boom.
sentences.chinese: 发表论文的压力已经掀起了代写的高潮。

sentences.english: His will was written by his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他的遗嘱是由他妻子代写的。

sentences.english: Many celebrities hire ghost writers to write their biography.
sentences.chinese: 有很多名人都聘请捉刀人代写他们的传记。

sentences.english: P. S. This letter is written by other guy I asked on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 顺便提一句，这邮件是我在网上请人代写的。

sentences.english: He devilled an article for the writer.
sentences.chinese: 他替作家代写了一篇文章。

sentences.english: In the process of generation write master thesis?
sentences.chinese: 在代写硕士论文过程中？

sentences.english: He makes a living ghostwriting the autobiographies of raddled showbiz veterans.
sentences.chinese: 他靠为过气的做秀人物代写自传为生。

definition: to write on behalf of sb/to ghostwrite
person who writes articles - newspapers, magazines, blogs (informal)/scribe/copyist/a talented writer of articles or of calligraphy
to take a test or exam for sb
to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
to act for sb else/to act on sb's behalf/an agent/a diplomatic representative/a chargé d'affaires
to fill in a form for sb else
to write without lifting one's pen from the paper/(in the Romanization of Chinese) to write two or more syllables together as a single word (not separated by spaces)
to write for sb else/a lawyer who writes legal documents for his clients
to forward (a message, letter, article etc)
paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
